meanings.definition: Combine (two signals) to produce a new signal with a frequency equal to the difference between the frequencies of the original signals.
meanings.sent1: I heterodyned the music from two radios to create a unique sound.
meanings.sent2: The radio receiver heterodyned the incoming signals to generate a clear audio output.
meanings.sent3: At the party, we heterodyned different genres of music for a fun dance mix.
meanings.sent4: Her voice heterodyned with the background noise, creating an interesting effect.
meanings.sent5: The scientist heterodyned the light waves to reveal hidden patterns.

meanings.definition: To mix or blend different elements or components together.
meanings.sent1: She heterodyned the colors to create a beautiful painting.
meanings.sent2: The chef heterodyned various spices to enhance the flavor of the dish.
meanings.sent3: The kids heterodyned their toys to make a new game.
meanings.sent4: His words heterodyned with her emotions, creating a touching moment.
meanings.sent5: The artist heterodyned different textures to add depth to the artwork.
